description: This file defines a BasicAgentExecutor class that implements an agent execution workflow using an AI model, specifically GPT-4, and handles message processing and event queuing.

classes.name: BasicAgentExecutor
classes.description: Implements an agent executor that processes messages and interacts with an AI model, supporting execution and cancellation.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the BasicAgentExecutor with a predefined agent.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Asynchronously processes a message from the request context, interacts with the AI agent, and enqueues the response event.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Asynchronously handles cancellation requests, currently not supported.
